name: Shootin'
description:
Shootin'. The name says it all. Traverse weird lands and shoot up a bunch of things with a variety of odd weapons. Featuring geometry that reacts to the action with markings left until disturbed again, destruction, and some minor construction... but mostly destruction.

Minimum System Requirements:

  • Windows XP/Vista/8/8.1
  • Dual core 2.4GHz processor
  • 1.5GBs of RAM
  • OpenGL 3.0 compliant GPU with 256MBs of RAM
  • Keyboard and Mouse

Recommended Specs:

  • Windows XP/Vista/8/8.1
  • Quad Core processor
  • 2GBs of RAM
  • OpenGL 3.0 compliant GPU with 386MBs of RAM
  • Keyboard and Mouse
